headline: Citizens Financial Group (CFG) Valuation Check As Shares Show Sustained Momentum
summary: Why Citizens Financial Group is on investors’ radar Citizens Financial Group (CFG) has drawn attention recently as investors reassess large regional banks, with its share price reflecting mixed short term moves alongside stronger performance over the past 3 months and year. That backdrop is prompting closer scrutiny of how Citizens Financial Group’s current valuation, profitability, and balance of consumer and commercial banking activities might fit into a diversified portfolio for investors...
